page.title: 19Transport and Communications
page.content: The dual carriageway of the A.41 begins at Bletchley Manor and ends just past the entrance to Hoarstone. On Wednesday 8th May we counted traffic passing Bletchley Manor between 2.45 and 3.15p.m.We counted 21 open lorries, 22 closed lorries, 15 vans, 50 cars, 1 horsebox, 6 tankers, 1 army truck and 1 dustcart_ 117 vehicles travelling north, and 15 open lorries,11 closed lorries,14 vans,60 cars,2 motor_cycles,1 pedal cycle,8 tankers,1 army truck, 1 bus and 2 pick_ups_ 115 vechicles travelling south. The only public transport in our area is a weekly bus service to Whitchurch.Most families have a car and those who do not hire a taxi or walk.There are 2 public telephones, 1 A.A.box and 3 post boxes.Most houses have a telephone.
